content: Hello, does Zulip support drawing commutative diagrams?
Yes, you can check out the source of https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/267928-condensed-mathematics/topic/LES.20for.20Ext/near/257368936 to see how its done I guess
Ah, shame there are no diagonal arrows yet.
One workaround is to use https://q.uiver.app/ and then post a screenshot and/or link to your diagram
